output: A subscription service that provides home-cooked meals delivered to the customer’s doorstep every month. The customer can choose from a variety of recipes created by a team of professional chefs and they will also receive detailed instructions on how to cook each meal. The customer can customize their order each month and the pricing will be based on the ingredients used and the number of meals they receive. It’s an easy way to enjoy delicious, healthy meals at home without the hassle of grocery shopping or meal prep.
